dcterms:creator: K. Alikas
S. Lautt
A. Reinart
dcterms:description: A simulation dataset used for the retrieval of coloured dissolved organic matter (CDOM) from remote sensing signals, particularly focusing on extreme absorbing waters.
dcterms:title: Hydrolight simulation dataset

dcterms:creator: M. Hieromyni
H. Krasemann
D. Mueller
C. Brockmann
A. Ruescas
K. Stelzer
B. Nechad
K. Ruddick
S. Simis
G. Tisltone
F. Steinmetz
P. Regner
dcterms:description: A dataset focused on ocean colour remote sensing of extreme case-2 waters, used for assessing CDOM concentrations in various water bodies.
dcterms:title: C2AX dataset

dcterms:creator: Kari Kallio
dcterms:description: A dataset that estimates the optical properties of Finnish lakes using bio-optical models and water quality monitoring data, focusing on CDOM and chlorophyll concentrations.
dcterms:title: C2A dataset
